name: Seismitoad
author: Misa Tsutsui
flavor_text: This Pokémon is popular among the elderly, who say the vibrations of its lumps are great for massages.

abilities.name: Quaking Zone
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent’s Active Pokémon cost {C} more.

attacks.name: Echoed Voice
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Echoed Voice attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
